original_text: The Pharisees said, ‘Moses said that a man could write a letter to say that he and his wife are no longer married. Then the man can send the woman away.’
korean_text: 이르되 모세는 이혼 증서를 써주어 버리기를 허락하였나이다

sentences.original_text: that a man could write a letter
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 편지를 쓸 수 있다고

sentences.original_text: to say that he and his wife
Then the man can send the woman away
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 남자는 그 여자를 보낼 수 있습니다
